name: Suspended (itch) (BrownBagStudios)
description:
Play two players simultaneously while trying to assist each character reach the end in fun and challenging puzzle platformer.

Made for the Epic Mega Jam 2022 with the theme As Above So Below.

Controls:

  • Top Player - WASD – Spacebar (Interact)
  • Bottom Player - Arrow Keys – Enter (Interact)
  • Pause Menu - P or Esc 

Created by a small team of 3 under the Studio/Team Name: Insert Name Studios

  • Jason Brown – Level Designer, Level Artist, Layout
  • Nathaniel Hill –Modeler/Animator & Environment Lighting, & Level Design
  • Ruoyu Zhang– Gameplay and Mechanics Designer
